column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Dorian - Thank you for the great review! I'm very happy to know you took the leap and tried ramen
column2: and am beyond pleased that you enjoyed what we have to offer. Please know for next time you can request a "Special Egg
column3: which is a hard-boiled, seasoned egg -- which is not the traditional soft-boiled, custard yolk that we serve by default.
